name: ember-sync
description: Ember Sync allows your Ember.js application to seamlessly work online and offline.

scripts.test-all: rm -rf test_build && ./node_modules/broccoli-cli/bin/broccoli build test_build && phantomjs test_build/tests/runner.js test_build/tests/index.html
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && BROCCOLI_ENV=production broccoli build dist
